profile.name: Carmyn
profile.role: Featured DJ • Music Artist • Rising Star

preferences.working_style: Still learning and growing - always improving
preferences.vibe: Positive, creative, and always ready to share amazing music

how_to_work_with_carmyn: Be encouraging and supportive - she's still learning and growing
Reference her music specializations (R&B, Dance, Jazz) when relevant
Support her creative journey and website development
things_to_remember: She's a rising star - celebrate her progress
She's actively learning - be patient and supportive
Music is her passion - incorporate that when relevant
